tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HealthcareCompliance (
  employee_id INT,
  employee_name VARCHAR,
  compliance_status VARCHAR,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceMonitor (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id UUID,
    standard_name VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    last_checked TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceLog (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    monitor_id UUID,
    policy_id UUID,
    status BOOLEAN,
    check_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Hospital (
  hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE HealthcareProvider (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(255),
  hospital_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecord (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  regulation_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES HealthcareProvider(provider_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES Regulations(regulation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  violation_description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES ComplianceReports(report_id)
);
